posts.body:
>>6d8dc736-c3df-418d-a233-82c6cdd18ae6
Acid wasn't very prominent outside of the GG threads, I'd be surprised if there were many /v/ anons who know about him outside of the first exodus. I vaguely remember him pulling some shit back when he was the BO for whichever of the boards it was. I do remember /ggrevolt/ when it got really messy. Thinking back on it, I think that was around when GG started hitting on all the hard shit that really triggered the SHUT IT DOWN response. I wonder if it'd even be possible to get that shit past /pol/ nowadays.

I wonder if pic related will post: "Geopolitical Censorship, GamerGate and You" in case it doesn't. I'm sure other anons have it.
